channel.title: Ragnarok
channel.description:
Who plays it? I want to know if anyone here knows it seeing not a lot of people post about it.
It's a fun game.. Graphics aren't too complex, their card system makes them SUPER UNIQUE, and their private servers and NPCs rock and easily scriptable. Plus their private servers are 100% stable, meaning they didn't leave out anything, unlike Runescape servers still being developed.

item.title: Ragnarok
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
